attributes.action: Make it an offence to run over a cat and not report it.
attributes.additional_details:
All animals deserve to be treated equally and cats are beloved pets to human owners as are dogs.
There should be a legal right for cats to be recognised in the same manner.
attributes.background: Allow cats to have the same rights in law  as reporting a hit and run scenario concerning a dog.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require drivers to stop and take cats to the vets if they hit them in their car
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728011
